definition.value: Smart SEO Schema Assistant

Status:
Enable or disable the Smart SEO Schema extension

Show product image:
Include product images in Schema.org markup for better search results

Show product review:
Include aggregate ratings and reviews in Schema.org markup

Show product SKU:
Include product SKU in Schema.org markup for inventory tracking

Show product price:
Include pricing information and offers in Schema.org markup

Show product stock:
Include stock availability information in Schema.org markup

Description source:
Choose which product description to use for Schema.org markup

After this extension is enabled and configured, you can test your product pages using the Google Rich Results Test.

To view the list of available AI models, visit the Groq Model Documentation.
To create or manage your API key, go to the Groq API Key Console.

Fallback System: Configure backup models below to ensure AI generation continues working even if the primary model fails.

Minimum Tokens Per Content:
Minimum guaranteed tokens for each individual content generation. Default: 100

Log Token Usage:
Log detailed token consumption for AI API calls to monitor usage and costs
Auto (Blurb if available, otherwise Description)
Product Blurb
Product Description

Custom Description:
150-160 character optimized description

Enable Product Variants:
Include variants in Schema.org markup

FAQ Content:
Questions and answers for FAQPage schema

HowTo Instructions:
Step-by-step usage instructions

Product Reviews:
Manage database reviews with AI optimization

Show FAQ Tab in Storefront:
Display FAQ content as a tab on the product page for customers

Show HowTo Tab in Storefront:
Display HowTo instructions as a tab on the product page for customers
Generate Description
Generate FAQ
Generate HowTo
Description generated successfully! Optimized for 150-160 characters.
FAQ content generated successfully!
HowTo instructions generated successfully!
Failed to generate description. Please check your AI configuration.
Failed to generate FAQ content. Please check your AI configuration.
Failed to generate HowTo instructions. Please check your AI configuration.

Groq API Key:
Enter your Groq API key for AI-powered content generation. Get one at groq.com

Primary AI Model:
Main Groq AI model (e.g., llama-3.1-8b-instant). For available models, visit Groq Models Documentation. Popular models: llama-3.1-8b-instant (fast), gemma2-9b-it (balanced), llama-3.3-70b-versatile (high quality).

Fallback Model 1:
First backup model to try if primary model fails (recommended: gemma2-9b-it). Used automatically when server errors occur.

Fallback Model 2:
Second backup model for maximum reliability (recommended: llama-3.1-70b-versatile). Used if both primary and first fallback fail.

Enable AI Auto-Generation:
Automatically improve product descriptions using AI when generating Schema.org markup

Enable Product Variants (hasVariant):
Generate Schema.org hasVariant markup from AbanteCart product options for better SEO

Enable FAQ Schema:
Generate FAQPage structured data for products to enhance search results with FAQ snippets

Enable HowTo Schema:
Generate HowTo structured data for products with usage instructions

Enable Review Schema:
Generate Review structured data for enhanced product ratings in search results

Enable Organization Schema:
Include Organization structured data to identify your business in search results

AI Temperature:
Controls AI creativity (0.0-1.0). Lower values = more focused, higher values = more creative. Default: 0.7

Max Tokens:
Maximum length of AI-generated content for individual generation. Default: 800 tokens (~600 words)

Primary API Timeout (seconds):
Maximum time to wait for primary model response. Fallback models use progressive timeouts (45s, 60s). Default: 30 seconds

Auto-Generate FAQ:
Use AI to automatically create FAQ content based on product information

FAQ Questions Count:
Number of FAQ questions to generate automatically. Default: 3

Auto-Generate HowTo:
Use AI to create HowTo instructions for product usage

HowTo Steps Count:
Number of steps to generate in HowTo instructions. Default: 5

Auto-Generate Reviews:
Create technical reviews using AI for products without existing reviews

Minimum Review Rating:
Minimum rating for auto-generated reviews (1-5). Default: 4

Maximum Review Rating:
Maximum rating for auto-generated reviews (1-5). Default: 5

Organization Logo URL:
Full URL to your organization's logo for Schema.org markup

Contact Type:
Primary contact type for your organization in structured data
Customer Service
Technical Support
Billing Support
Sales

Organization Phone:
Main phone number for customer contact in international format (+1-555-123-4567)

Shipping Rate:
Default shipping cost for all products in your store (e.g., 5.99)

Shipping Currency:
Currency code for shipping rates (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)

Shipping Destination Country:
Primary shipping destination country code (e.g., US, CA, GB)

Handling Time (Min Days):
Minimum business days to process orders before shipping

Handling Time (Max Days):
Maximum business days to process orders before shipping

Transit Time (Min Days):
Minimum business days for delivery after shipping

Transit Time (Max Days):
Maximum business days for delivery after shipping

Return Window (Days):
Number of days customers have to return products

Return Policy Country:
Country where return policy applies (e.g., US, CA, GB)

Return Method:
How customers can return products

Return Fees Policy:
Who pays for return shipping costs
Return By Mail
Return In Store
Return At Kiosk
Free Return
Customer Pays Return Fees
Return Shipping Fees Apply
Global Shipping Settings
Global Return Policy Settings
Frontend Tab Display
AI Fallback Models

Debug Mode:
Enable debugging output for Schema.org generation (for developers only)

Log AI API Calls:
Log all AI API requests and responses for monitoring and debugging
